alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 8:18PM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .Heavy rain that fell last week, combined with expected rain this week, will cause continued rises on the Little Wabash River. At Carmi, the river is expected to crest on Thursday in moderate flood, around 6.5 feet above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, The inundation of county roads begins. At 32.0 feet, Flood waters flow up McHenry slough and areas near Route 1 and 14 in Carmi begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 28.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 33.5 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
